short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open Devops files in VSCode and Jetbrains products!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly open Devops files in VSCode and Jetbrains products (like Rider, Intellij, Webstorm)!
Still in development so it is currently relatively limited. 

I am not associated with Az. Devops, VSCode, or any Jetbrains products. This is a hobby extension I created to make Az. Devops a bit better for me.

Reuploaded as the previous publication used a trademarked name.
